9.title: From the Mountains to the Beaches on Maui
9.plot: Young parents living on Maui are trading rainy weather in Wailuku for the sunny beaches of Kihei. They love the Hawaiian culture and are ready to downsize to a condo with fun amenities and be as close to the beach as possible.

10.title: Feeling Centered on Maui
10.plot:

11.title: Trading Toronto Winters for Oahu Vistas
11.plot: Newlyweds are leaving Toronto to move to their honeymoon paradise of Oahu. He's intent on finding a place with a yard for their dog and room for a home office, while she is more concerned with a large lanai to take in the views.

12.title: Graduating to the Real World on Oahu
12.plot: A free-spirited nurse from San Francisco is ready to make Maui her new home. Looking forward to surfing and doing yoga on the beach, she's searching for a house that is close to the beach and offers outdoor space for entertaining.

13.title: Seeking Small Town Charm on the Big Island
13.plot: A family from Oahu wants to trade in their long commutes for the pastoral life in Waimea on the Big Island. They want a property with ample land to raise livestock, as well as entertaining space for their kids and grandchildren.

1.title: Indianapolis to Dreamy Kauai
1.plot: After landing a job, an Indiana couple drops everything and moves to Kauai.

2.title: Alaska Family Moves to Kauai
2.plot: Leaving a large Alaskan home, a family of eight seeks a new life on Kauai.

3.title: Upgrade from Colorado to Kauai
3.plot: A Colorado family looks for a house in Kauai to escape the harsh winters.

4.title: Oregon to Maui for Scuba Fun
4.plot: After long Oregon winters, a scuba diver moves to Maui to live her passion.

5.title: Upsize and Upgrade from Washington to the Big Island
5.plot: Parents with twins upsize and upgrade from Washington to the Big Island.

6.title: Life Swap from Japan to Hawaii
6.plot: Young family moves from Tokyo to the Big Island to fulfill their dream.

7.title: Surf Legend Moves Family Back to the Beach
7.plot: Eliza and Keoni are searching for a home on Oahu to grow in with their teenage children. Keoni is a former pro-surfer and for him close access to the beach is a must. After seeing a mixture of properties with Hawaii Life Realtor David Buck, Eliza and Keoni must decide what they'll sacrifice to land at the perfect spot near the ocean.

8.title: Rainy Washington to Sunny Maui
8.plot: Too many summers in rainy Washington, a couple changes to sunny Maui.

9.title: Rambler Lands on Big Island
9.plot: Young father has lived everywhere, but wants to settle on the Big Island.

10.title: Family Moves from California to the Big Island
10.plot: Family searches for a Big Island home to enjoy all of Hawaii's activities.

11.title: Multi-Generational on Oahu
11.plot: New parents are looking for a home to fit them and their mother-in-law.

12.title: Maui Home for Hula Dancer
12.plot: A hula dancer looks for a comfortable home for her and her two children.

13.title: Newlyweds in Honolulu, Oahu
13.plot: Newlyweds seek their first apartment in Honolulu with island amenities.

1.title: Goodbye Snowy Canada, Hello Sunny
1.plot: Nancy and Vrejj Biegler have moved from snowy Calgary to the Big Island and are now looking for their dream home. They're looking at two properties in the dry area of Waikoloa and one in the wetter tropical climate of Waimea.

2.title: A Family Moves from Pittsburgh to Princeville in Search of a Laidback Lifestyle
2.plot: JT and Doreen are leaving Pittsburgh for a more laid-back lifestyle in Princeville, Kauai. Roni Marley helps them find their piece of paradise. Their main requirements are privacy and a good kitchen for Doreen's cupcake business.

3.title: Family Moves from New Hampshire
3.plot: Jill and Chris Caisey are ready to leave New Hampshire to fulfill their dream of moving with their kids to Kauai to live the good life. Roni Marley shows them several plantation-style properties with good proximity to the beach.

4.title: A Young Couple Leaves the Hustle and Bustle of Honolulu Seeking the Quieter Parts of Oahu
4.plot: Surfing enthusiasts Felipe and Kelley decide that now is the time to plant roots on Maui for the warm water and epic waves.

5.title: A Baltimore Couple Moves to Hawaii to Start Exciting New Careers on the Big Island
5.plot: Chris and Nina Lambert are moving from Baltimore with their two dogs to begin a new life on the Big Island. Nina was offered a position as a director of Marine Life, while Chris is taking the opportunity to become a pilot.

6.title: A Couple Moves from Buffalo to the Big Island in Hopes of a Change of Pace and Living Off the Land
6.plot: Partners Grace and Cecile, a physician and chef, move from Buffalo to the Big Island for a change of pace. Grace's new job requires her to be in both Waimea and Hilo, so they're looking for a two bedroom home in-between.

7.title: Former US Air Force Physician Relocates His Family to Kauai for Laidback Lifestyle
7.plot: Chris and Nina Lambert are moving from Baltimore with their two dogs to begin a new life on the Big Island. Nina was offered a position as a director of Marine Life, while Chris is taking the opportunity to become a pilot.

8.title: A Single Mother Looks for a Home for Herself and Her Daughter on Kauai
8.plot: Rebecca Hart fell in love with Hawaii more than 10 yrs ago when she came to Oahu for college. After graduation, she knew she didn't want to return to her home in Minnesota. So, she's ready to plant her roots in Kauai.

9.title: A Young, Active Couple House Hunts in Oahu for a Home Where They Can Start a Family
9.plot: Shavonne and Thi Truong dreamed of honeymooning in Hawaii, but the newlyweds never made it. A few years later, the Army stationed them in Oahu. Having never been to Hawaii, they packed their bags and reported for duty.

10.title: Single Mother of Three on Oahu Looks for a Smaller Condo as Her Grown Kids Go Off to College.
10.plot: Kailani Taylor, a single mother of three, has lived the majority of her life on Oahu. Now that her children are getting older, Kailani wants to downsize to a new home that can better serve as she enters a new chapter in her life.

12.plot: Oregon-based couple, Lisa and James, decided that they wanted to make a permanent move to Maui when they first vacationed there, swam in the ocean and stuck their heads underwater to hear the whales singing.

13.title: So Long Florida, Aloha Maui
13.plot: Linda Lindsay has traveled all over, but the moment she got off the plane in Maui, she fell in love. So she packed up her mom and her two boys and made the move to Hawaii.

1.title: A View from the Big Island
1.plot: Chris and Annette Hodges live a comfortable life in Atlanta with their 3 children. They're a very active family and have always dreamed about moving closer to the ocean. They're looking for a house on the Big Island.

2.title: Shipping Out to Oahu
2.plot: Leaving cold North Dakota winters behind, a young couple looks for a home on the west side of Oahu.

3.title: Big Move to the Big Island

10.plot: Jean-Marc and Michele leave behind the heat of Arizona to raise their daughters in Kauai.

11.plot: Years after honeymooning in Hawaii, Thom and Connie decide to move their big family to Kauai.

5.title: South Florida Couple Hunts for a New Home on the Big Island
5.plot: Michelle and Michael finally leave the Wisconsin weather behind and head to Hawaii for a new start.

6.title: A Lover of the Outdoors Starts Next Chapter of Life on the Big Island
6.plot: Amy came to Hawaii for a change of scenery and ended up falling in love with the island. Amy likes to spend her free time outside, so she wants a place where her family can come visit that also has space to store her outdoor gear

7.title: Free Spirit Flees Wisconsin for Big Island of Hawaii
7.plot: Michelle and Michael finally leave the Wisconsin weather behind and head to Hawaii for a new start.

8.title: Soon-to-Be Parents Look for House on Oahu
8.plot: After a whirlwind romance and marriage, expectant parents Tony and Leslie are looking for their first home together on the island of Oahu. They want a waterfront home so they can live a healthy lifestyle before their baby arrives.

10.title: San Antonio Family Searches for Oahu Home with Mountain Views

12.title: Montana Parents of Six Downsize for Cooler Lifestyle on Kauai
12.plot: Montana natives are prepared to exchange indoor space for lots of outdoor living on the island of Kauai.

13.title: California Couple Looks for Lots of Land on Kauai
13.plot: Tripp and Deja left San Diego city life behind for a more tranquil life on Kauai. They both want to devote more time to their hobbies of surfing and horseback riding.

1.title: Finding a Farm on Maui
1.plot: A tattoo artist trades in the long, cold Rocky Mountain winters for a piece of agricultural paradise on Maui.

2.title: Putting Down Roots in Oahu
2.plot: Carl, Lisa and their two kids have loved renting in Hawaii after Carl was assigned to Oahu for his military career. Wanting to stay permanently, they are searching for a place that will allow them to enjoy their life in paradise.

3.title: A New Start on Oahu
3.plot: Wanting their two children to experience a year-round outdoor lifestyle, an Oregon couple moves to Oahu. They hope to find a place with easy access to the water while still being close to downtown Honolulu and its restaurants.

4.title: From the Big Apple to Oahu
4.plot: Best friends Elodie and Yaya leave behind the hustle and bustle of New York City for a change of pace in Hawaii. They are looking for a fixer-upper they can make their own so they can enjoy the beautiful atmosphere of Oahu.

5.title: A Young Couple Looks to Raise Kids in Paradise
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Young Family Looks Forward to New Adventures on Oahu
6.plot: Wyatt, Tau'Mee and their nine-month-old daughter Rowan move to Oahu where Wyatt is being stationed by the army. They are excited to find the perfect home for their family with room to expand and house family visitors.

7.title: Country Life on the Big Island
7.plot: A young woman leaves Houston to start a new job on Hawaii's Big Island. After years of being cooped up indoors in Texas, she wants to find a home close to all the outdoor activities she loves.

8.title: Couple Moves to Big Island to Start Family
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Outdoor Life on the Big Island
9.plot: A Oregon family returns to the Big Island to look for a home with lots of land so they can pursue their dreams of living a homegrown lifestyle.

10.title: From Canada to the Big Island
10.plot: Looking for a slower-paced life and the ability to spend more time together, a Canadian family seeks out the aloha spirit on Hawaii's Big Island.

11.title: Living the Dream on Maui
11.plot: Tired of Ottawa's long, brutal winters, a couple looks for a house in Maui that is big enough for their family and close enough to the beach so their children can enjoy the sun and waves as much as possible.

12.title: From Seattle to Amazing Maui
12.plot: An adventure-seeking couple leaves the Seattle rain behind for a new island lifestyle on Maui. Hoping to make the move as smooth as possible, they are looking for properties with additional dwellings to rent out for extra income.

13.title: Bay Area to the Big Island
13.plot: After years in a stressful Silicon Valley job, a California woman leaves the mainland to work remotely from Hawaii's Big Island. Searching for a home in Kona, she desires a place with ample outdoor space to entertain her friends.

1.title: At Home on Oahu
1.plot: Tony and Amor are fed up with the cold winters and 'rat race' of the DC area. With an eco-cleaning business that can be run anywhere, they decided it was time to embrace the sunny island vibe of Oahu and find their dream beach house.

2.title: Single and Ready for Oahu
2.plot: Brandon is a single guy from South Carolina who's self-described daredevil. He fell in love with Oahu the first time he visited and went skydiving. Now he's looking for a home in either Honolulu or on the windward side of Oahu.

3.title: Getting Back in Shape on Oahu
3.plot: Texas newlyweds Evan and Stephanie relocate to Oahu to pursue a job opportunity and live a more active lifestyle outdoors. They're search for a beautiful starter home near wide roads and running trails.

4.title: Mom Follows Family to Oahu
4.plot: After her daughter moved to Oahu, Jenny decided to leave the Arizona heat and follow her to the land of waterfalls and beaches. Finding a job on the island was easy, but finding a dog-friendly home is a lot more difficult.

5.title: Newlyweds Make Move to Oahu
5.plot: A young newlywed couple jumps at the opportunity to relocate to Ewa Beach on Oahu. They're looking for an active lifestyle and are determined to buy a home steps away from the sand.

6.title: Trading Sweaters for Bikinis on Oahu
6.plot: Clint and Jordan were pleasantly surprised when the Army switched their station from Washington to Oahu. They're eager to raise their three kids close to the beaches of Kailua. Can they find a house with a big backyard and a pool?

7.title: Leaving Arizona for Kauai
7.plot: Ann and Archie have decided to ditch their humdrum lives in Phoenix for an exciting new business venture in Kauai. This fun-loving couple are on the hunt for a house with a garden view that is perfect for entertaining.

8.title: From Cold Aspen to the Sunny Big Island
8.plot: A professional chef and his wife are sick of the cold Colorado climate, so after an event on the Big Island, they've decided to call Hawaii their new home. Now they're facing some tough decisions about choosing their first house.

9.title: A Big Yard on the Big Island
9.plot: While vacationing on the Big Island of Hawaii, Steve and Barbara's children saw the ocean for the first time and never wanted to leave. Can this active family find a house close to Waimea with a large yard for the kids to play?

10.title: From Washington to Kauai
10.plot: After falling in love with Hawaii on a recent trip, Therese decided she'd had enough of the rainy Pacific Northwest. James agreed it's time to follow his wife's dream and move to the beautiful beaches of Kauai.

11.title: Leaving California for Kauai
11.plot: Kurt and Rebecca love kayaking and the outdoors. With their children now grown, they're starting a new chapter in their life on Kauai. They want a home with easy access to warm waters and the rest of the island's natural beauty.

12.title: Best of Both Worlds on Oahu
12.plot: A couple is moving to Hawaii to escape the hustle and bustle of Washington, D.C. Their agent is tasked with finding a two-bedroom condo with amazing views for no more than $950,000 so the couple can make Hawaii their forever home.

13.title: Open for Business in Oahu
13.plot: Kansas City friends Matt, Ryan and Lucas are looking to bring their business to Waikiki, and they need to find a condo in the heart of Oahu where they can live and work while getting set up.

1.title: Dreams Come True in Maui
1.plot: A California couple begins their search for their own little piece of paradise in the Lahaina area of Maui.

2.title: Oahu's Aloha Spirit
2.plot: A married couple misses the aloha spirit of their Hawaiian hometown, so they quickly jump at an opportunity to move home to Oahu. They enlist an agent to help them find an open-concept home on the windward side of the island.

3.title: Snapping Up a House on Oahu
3.plot: A California couple has grown tired of their busy lifestyle and want to find new thrills in Oahu. They love the town's laid-back vibe and hope to find the perfect place to to expand their underwater photography business.

4.title: Graduating on Oahu
4.plot: A recent college graduate can't imagine returning to rainy Seattle, so she's staying put and looking for a home in Oahu. With the help of an agent, she hopes to find a pet-friendly condo close to her favorite beaches and parks.

5.title: New Job and New Home on Oahu
5.plot: A newly engaged couple is tired of rough Ohio winters and follows a job opportunity to Oahu. They're ready to enjoy the island's weather and landscape, and they hope to find the perfect open-concept home with a spacious yard.

6.title: Falling in Love with Maui
6.plot: After making several trips to the beautiful island, a couple is ready to move their family and window-washing business to Maui. They enlist a local broker to find the perfect home that's suitable for the whole family.

7.title: Homesick for Maui
7.plot: After years of vacationing on Maui, a Kentucky couple finally decides to move to the island with their six pets.

8.title: Relaxing on Maui
8.plot: Tired of their busy city life, a San Francisco couple decides to settle down on Maui to raise their one-year-old daughter.

9.title: Newlyweds on Oahu
9.plot: Outdoorsy Arizona newlyweds want to leave the desert behind and move to Oahu. They're excited for the change in scenery and hope to find a home with a spacious yard that's perfect for a pet and entertaining.

10.title: Living Large on the Big Island
10.plot: A large Oregon family tries to find the perfect home that will please everyone in the Kona area of the Big Island.

11.title: Blue-tiful Big Island
11.plot: Life in hectic Denver is too much for Angela, and one vacation has convinced her to move to the Big Island for her next chapter. Her son is helping her look for the perfect property with an ocean view and room for their dogs.

12.title: Fishing to Farming on the Big Island
12.plot: A couple with high-pressure jobs as fishermen is ready for a change of pace. They fell in love with the Big Island during a vacation, now they want to find the perfect home where they can trade in fishing for a life of farming.

13.title: Embracing Nature on Kauai
13.plot: A California family turns their dream of a home with a garden and a mountain view on Kauai into a reality.

1.title: Finding Inspiration on Kauai
1.plot: A thrill-seeking restaurant manager is ready to put down roots on the island of Kauai. The beaches, activities and community of Kapa'a have made her feel at home, so she's ready to settle down in her own dream home in paradise.

2.title: Namaste on Kauai
2.plot: A thrill-seeking restaurant manager is ready to put down roots on the island of Kauai. The beaches, activities and community of Kapa'a have made her feel at home, so she's ready to settle down in her own dream home in paradise.

3.title: Kauai Closing
3.plot: A family from Atlanta, Georgia, is ready to ditch their hectic lives and pursue their passions on the island of Kauai. They love being outdoors and hope to find a home that offers a lifestyle they couldn't find in Georgia.

4.title: Less House, More Oahu
4.plot: After years of taking care of a large home, a couple is looking for something simple on Oahu. They want to spend more time outdoors and think Ko Olina's year-round sunshine and resort-style amenities are exactly what they need.

5.title: Coming Together in Oahu
5.plot: After years of visiting Hawaii, a couple is moving to Oahu with their daughter and grandsons. They're hoping to find the perfect home where the daughter can finish her master's degree and the grandkids can attend school.

6.title: Seventh Heaven on Oahu
6.plot: Recent health issues require a Colorado couple and their five girls to live at sea level, so they're heading to Hawaii. They hope to find a large house within walking distance to the water on Oahu's windward coast.

7.title: Sealing the Deal in Hawaii
7.plot: A California couple wants to start a new chapter together and move to the Big Island of Hawaii. They feel like they were made to live on the island and hope to find a home where they can enjoy the community and water activities.

8.title: Multi-Generational Family Moves to the Big Island
8.plot: A Minnesota couple relocates to the Big Island of Hawaii and brings four generations of family with them. They can't wait to settle down in the Kailua-Kona area on a property with enough outdoor space to possibly build a yurt.

9.title: Ready for More Time as a Family on Oahu
9.plot: A military family is transferring from the Middle East to Pearl Harbor, Oahu, with their 7-month-old son. They're ready to embrace a more temperate climate and enjoy more time spent outdoors as a family.

10.title: Return to the Big Island
10.plot: A California couple wants their kids to have the same experience she had growing up in Hawaii. They decide on the Big Island, but they must weigh beach living against their desire for a private family home within their budget.

11.title: California Dreaming on Kona
11.plot: A job transfer to Kailua-Kona makes dreams of living in Hawaii a reality for a California couple. They're hoping the move means sunshine year-round and no more shared walls as they search for a single-family home in their budget.

12.title: Deep Dive on Maui
12.plot: California dive enthusiasts are ready to make a permanent move to Maui. They aren't afraid to tackle some projects, but they'll need to decide just how big a renovation they want to take on within their budget.

13.title: Fishing for a New Life on Maui
13.plot: A single dad wants to ditch the busy Bay Area for a slower pace of life on Maui. He's looking for a turnkey home on the gorgeous northwest coast that's within walking distance to the beach and his son's new school.

1.title: Raising Three Boys in Upcountry Maui
1.plot: With two active boys and a third on the way, a newlywed couple is excited to buy their first home together. They're hoping to find a place in Kula, known as Maui's bread basket, so they can grow their own fruits and vegetables.

2.title: Ocean Views and Maui Mermaids in Kihei
2.plot: A Seattle couple looks for a home in Kihei with an ocean view and pool.

3.title: Coming Home to Old Hawaii Charm
3.plot: A Maui native dreams of returning to the island after over 40 years spent living on the mainland. Now that her children are grown, she enlists her sister to help find the perfect house close to the beach with "old Hawaii charm."

4.title: Leaving Idaho to Scuba Dive in Kona
4.plot: An Idaho couple who fell in love with Hawaii on a scuba diving trip 25 years ago is ready to move to the Big Island. They're searching for a single-family home that's close to the ocean and has a yard for their dogs.

5.title: Dog Days on the Big Island
5.plot: After traveling throughout the world, an Oregon couple decides to settle down on the Big Island of Hawaii. They love the community feel and slower pace the island offers, and can't wait to call the town of Kona home.

6.title: Making New Memories on the Big Island
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Trading in Yacht Life for the Big Island
7.plot: After traveling the globe for years as a personal chef on yachts, a young woman is ready to put her feet in the sand permanently and purchase a home on the Big Island of Hawaii.

8.title: Creating a New Chapter on Oahu
8.plot: An active duty couple is transferring from a base in Virginia to the island of Oahu. But being a photographer and clothing designer, they'll need enough office space in their new home to accommodate their businesses.

9.title: Seeking Sun on the Big Island
9.plot: After falling in love with The Big Island after a recent trip, a couple leaves Oregon for the constant sunshine. They look for a move-in ready home with a pool, as well as a fence and plenty of yard space for their three dogs.

10.title: Big Island Slice of Paradise
10.plot: After visiting The Big Island for work, a Seattle couple decides to pack up and find a new home in paradise. They are hoping to find a new construction home with room for a pool and a big back yard for their son and large dog.

11.title: Taking the Next Step on Oahu
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Building a New Life on Oahu
12.plot: After vacationing in Hawaii for years, an active Seattle woman is leaving the cold behind for endless sunshine on Oahu. She'd prefer a move-in ready home, but isn't opposed to getting her hands dirty with some renovations.

13.title: Newly Engaged and Moving Back to Oahu
13.plot:
Know what this is about?

imdb.title: Hawaii Life
plot: Americans make the move to Hawaii to find the home of their dreams in paradise.
